sentences.sContent: Dad's flirting with all the ladies, or they're all flirting with him, as usual.
sentences.sCn: 爸爸在和所有的女士打情骂俏，或者说她们都在和他调情，跟平常一样。

synos.tran: 调情；玩弄；轻率地对待；摆动
急扔；调情的人；卖弄风骚的人

words.tran: 轻浮的；调情的；爱调戏的
调情；调戏；挑逗；不认真的考虑

trans.tranCn: 调情；玩弄；轻率地对待；摆动
trans.tranOther: to behave towards someone in a way that shows that you are sexually attracted to them, although you do not really want a relationship with them

trans.tranCn: 急扔；调情的人；卖弄风骚的人
